formatDescription: CorelDraw (styled CorelDRAW) is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Corel Corporation of Ottawa, Canada. It is also the name of Corel's Graphics Suite, which bundles CorelDraw with bitmap-image editor Corel Photo-Paint as well as other graphics-related programs.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University
formatProvenance: 11/2023 (v.116)- Priority over fmt/1886 Resource Interchange File Format (RIFF). Submitted by Brigham Young University.

internalSignatures.name: CorelDraw Drawing version 8 Bidi
internalSignatures.note: CorelDraw (styled CorelDRAW) is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Corel Corporation of Ottawa, Canada. It is also the name of Corel's Graphics Suite, which bundles CorelDraw with bitmap-image editor Corel Photo-Paint as well as other graphics-related programs.

developedBy.source: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University
